CheckTitle: Ensure Comprehensive Attachment Filtering is Enabled
Description: Checks if malware filter policies include all required L2 extensions for comprehensive attachment filtering.
Risk: If required extensions are missing from malware filter policies, malicious attachments may bypass filtering, increasing the risk of malware infection.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). 2. Expand Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies. 3. Under Policies, select Anti-malware. 4. Edit the policy and ensure all required extensions are included.

Recommendation.Text: Include all recommended L2 extensions in malware filter policies for comprehensive attachment filtering.

Notes: This check validates that all required L2 extensions are present in malware filter policies.
